about_the_game:
THE STORY:
DUMBOT NEEDS YOUR HELP. Dumbot is a self-aware Robot used by the military to test exoskeleton robotic suits. Dumbot has endured punishing testing including being shot at and crashed. Even worse he has been set on fire, had grenades thrown at him and had IEDs and other explosive devices used on him. So far he has survived all of these punishing and dangerous tests. But now he has a very serious problem. He overheard that his next test will be his last as he is set to be blown to smithereens in-order to test the max explosive tolerance of the exoskeleton suit. Now he needs to find a way out before it’s too late. CAN YOU HELP SAVE HIM?

ABOUT THE GAME / HOW TO PLAY:
Dumbot is a hyper casual side scrolling platformer game. As Dumbot runs through the different levels of a treacherous maze you direct his movements and make him jump in order to avoid a lethal obstacle.

There are two very long levels that Dumbot must get through before he escapes and just be warned this is a very difficult game so you will need excellent hand eye coordination and quick reflexes to help Dumbot escape.

To help you along these levels there are Flags that serve as checkpoints. Once you reach a checkpoint, the next time you will start at that latest flag so you don’t have to start at the beginning of the level again. However, be aware in order to activate a flag you need to collect 25 coins otherwise the checkpoint will not be activated.

So if you like platforming challenges then embark on this great adventure and save Dumbot from sure destruction.

FEATURES OF THE GAME:
• Fluid and challenging hyper casual platforming gameplay designed to entertain.
• Easy controls, use your keyboard or for some old school retro fun use a Joystick or handheld controller.

INCREDIBLE GRAPHICS AND CHALLENGING LEVELS:
• As your progress through the Dumbot world you can expect to be mesmerized by some incredible and unique graphics.
• Venture through this dangerous yet beautiful world and uncover ever more unique and challenging obstacles and weapons

AN AMAZING ADVENTURE:
• Beautiful graphics, fun sounds effects as well as dangerous and challenging obstacles all await you as you help Dumbot escape.
• Expect lots of surprises and twists and turns as you make your way through the checkpoints and levels of this beautiful game.

name: Dumbot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: XP/Vista/7/8 or 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Celeron or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: On Board Graphics Card / Stand Alone GPU not needed
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dumbot is a retro style hyper casual scrolling platformer game. Fluid and challenging gameplay designed to entertain. Amazing graphics, easy controls and two big worlds to explore providing you with many hours of fun playing time. Also no annoying in app purchases.
